description: Sedge (Carex conica 'Snowline') is an amazing evergreen that adds architectural interest to a garden in winter. This slow-growing perennial was developed in Germany and was awarded a Gold Medal at the 2016 Chelsea Flower Show. Its slender blades of green-silver foliage create a lined texture and contrast nicely with darker evergreen shrubs. This sedge typically grows 12 inches tall and 18 inches wide but can spread to 36 inches over time. It is low-maintenance and does not require pruning. It is also deer resistant and makes a great groundcover option for a partial to full shade garden. Sedge (Carex conica 'Snowline') is a great option for creating texture and year-round interest in today's modern garden.
